intro: Ononis natrix var. font-queri, commonly known as the Font-Queri bedstraw, is a flowering plant belonging to the Caryophyllaceae family. It is a low-growing perennial with slender, wiry stems that often lie close to the ground. The plant produces small, white or pinkish flowers arranged in clusters, typically blooming in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are linear and slightly hairy, and it thrives in well-drained, sandy or gravelly soils. It is often found in dry habitats such as rocky slopes and open woodlands.
